title: Rava Idli
ingredients: 1 tsp eno or ¼ tsp baking soda
instructions: Heat ghee in a pan, fry cashews until golden and set aside.
Add mustard seeds, cumin seeds, chana dal and sauté until golden.
Add curry leaves, green chilies, and ginger. Sauté for 30 seconds.
Add rava and fry on low flame until crunchy and aromatic. Cool completely.
Add coriander leaves, salt, and curd. Mix well and add water.
Cover and rest for 30 minutes. Grease idli plates with ghee.
Arrange cashews and grated carrots in each mould.
Add lemon juice to batter, then eno/baking soda. Mix gently.
Quickly pour batter into moulds and steam for 10 minutes.
Cool for 3-4 minutes, demould and serve with coconut chutney.

title: Masala Dosa
ingredients: For dosa batter: 2 cups rice, 1 cup urad dal, salt
For potato masala: 3 potatoes, 1 onion, 2 green chilies, curry leaves, mustard seeds, turmeric, salt
instructions: Soak rice and urad dal separately for 6 hours.
Grind separately, mix together, add salt, and ferment overnight.
Boil potatoes, peel and mash them.
Heat oil, add mustard seeds, curry leaves, and green chilies.
Add onions, sauté until golden, add turmeric and salt.
Add mashed potatoes and mix well.
Make thin dosas, add potato masala, fold, and serve hot.
